name: Stephen Stott
what_you_do: Stephen Stott is a grief educator, certified somatic breathwork practitioner, and founder of Embrace The Darkness LLC, an organization dedicated to providing compassionate, body-centered support for those navigating grief and trauma.
who_you_serve: Individuals facing diverse life challenges, including sudden loss, suicide, and complex trauma.
social_proof: Certifications from SomatIQ Breathwork and Grief.com
business_focus: Providing compassionate, body-centered support for those navigating grief and trauma.
